description_text: Hi are your wheels usb to use on and wheelbase Sent from my Galaxy

conversations.body_text: Hi, this is the functionality and compatible wheelbase of our steering wheel.   Two Magnetic paddle shifters  2-way switches  Six LED Buttons  Right Knob: Function selector 12-position rotary switch  Left Knob: Function selector size adjustment key,12-position adjustment knob (2x12 inputs), adjusts the size of the right function key  Compatible with Logitech G29 G27; Compatible with Thrustmaster T300RS/GT T500; Compatible with Fanatec Racing steering wheel  Suitable for equipment: PC

My wheelbase is the VRS dfp Sent from my Galaxy
-------- Original message --------
Hi Revz247,  Our quick-release mounting pattern is 70 mm.
